title: Drawing, "Console Table, Oval"
medium: Graphite and green color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: 11; lower right in graphite: SCALE 1 1/2"=1'0"/7694 [circled]; inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P; inscribed dimensions in graphite.
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for green lacquered (?) oval console table. Oval surface of table supported by two glass or metal (?) rods on left and right side and one rectangular green lacquer pillar at center. Legs of table on oval base/pedestal of green lacquer.
